sentences.cn: Ship 和 sheep 不押韵.

sentences.en: a collection of traditional rhymes with illustrations
All of the poems are written in traditional metres and rhyme schemes.
sentences.cn: 所有的诗都按传统的韵律和韵脚而作。

sentences.en: Broad leaves shone and swung gayly in rhyme.
sentences.cn: 树上的绿叶闪闪发光,有节奏地快乐地摇摆着.

sentences.en: Gay broad leaves shone and swung in rhyme.
sentences.cn: 轻盈的宽叶子有节奏地闪烁摇摆.

sentences.en: He picked people on a whim, without rhyme or reason.
sentences.cn: 他选人时总是随心所欲，毫无根据。

sentences.en: He was teaching Helen a little rhyme.
sentences.cn: 他当时正教海伦一首押韵小诗。

sentences.en: I cannot find a rhyme to " hiccups ".
sentences.cn: 我不能找到和 hiccups 同韵的词.

sentences.en: Outside, children were skipping and singing a rhyme.
sentences.cn: 外面孩子们一边跳绳一边唱着歌。

sentences.en: Porter stayed within the rules of rhyme.
Rhyme and meter are assistants to memory.
sentences.cn: 押韵和格律有助于记忆.

sentences.en: She lapsed into a little girl voice to deliver a nursery rhyme.
sentences.cn: 她改用童声唱起童谣来。

sentences.en: The last two lines of this poem don't rhyme properly.
sentences.cn: 这首诗后两句不怎么压韵.

sentences.en: The one rhyme for passion is fashion.
The song has rhyming couplets (= pairs of lines that end in words that rhyme ) .
This essay hardly makes any sense , it's neither rhyme nor reason.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章写得不伦不类,简直不知所云.

sentences.en: without rhyme or reason his mood changed.
sentences.cn: 他的心情莫名其妙地变了。

words.tran_cn: [生物] 有节奏的（等于rhythmical）；间歇的；合拍的
作诗者；蹩脚的诗人；作打油诗的人
使押韵；用韵诗表达；把…写作诗

phrases.tran_cn: 无意义;不可理解;杂乱无章[亦称without rhyme or reason]

trans.tran_en: a word that rhymes with another word
a short poem or song, especially for children, using words that rhyme
if two words or lines of poetry rhyme, they end with the same sound, including a vowel
